channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Radley London
channel.desc: Radley fashion accessories provide an aspirational mix of style, attention to detail and desirability, offering designs for every occasion that make you look and feel fabulous.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Plants2Gardens
channel.desc: Specialising in mature plants for instant impact, Plants2Gardens offer a huge array of vibrant, colourful blooms to help transform your outdoor space and bring your garden to life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% Off Garden D?cor
channel.desc: Elevate your outdoor oasis with our stunning garden decor collection, offering unmatched quality and style at an irresistible 50% discount.
